name: How to Comply with the new Beneficial Ownership Requirements
content: Recent legislation now requires the disclosure of individuals who exert a significant controlling or ownership interest in legal entities when acquiring banking or other financial services. These new requirements are intended to prevent money laundering, corruption, and tax evasion. The webinar will examine the requirements and how your institution can comply. Why Should You Attend New financial regulations require that legal entities include a listing of individuals who have beneficial ownership (ownership or control) over a legal entity. Failure to comply may result in substantial fines and penalties.
